titleStmt.title: A preparation to the due consideration and reverent comming to the holy communion of the body and blood of our Lorde The contentes whereof followe in the next page.
titleStmt.author: Barker, Christopher, 1529-1599.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
